snippet.title: 【STEAM】KukkoroDays Trailer ENG
snippet.description:
The appearance of a lady knight reincarnated from another world turns a mundane everyday life upside down! In this love-adventure game set in Akihabara, you can enjoy living together with a lady knight. It's a little serious, a little sad, and a little sexy, but most of all, it's fun!

■STEAM STORE
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1258340/KukkoroDays/

■CAST
CV:Nao Tsubakino

■Product Information
Title:KukkoroDays
Platform:STEAM
Release:May 2020
Genre:ADV
player:One player
Text language:English,Japanese,Traditional Chinese,Simplified characters
Voice language:Japanese
Official web:https://qureate.net/kukkorodays/en/

Illustration:WaonInui
Scenario:Linkedbrain Inc.
Producer:Yujiro Usuda
Publisher:qureate

The latest information is being distributed on Twitter!
https://twitter.com/qureate
